text: Kacper Stelmach (born 5 May 1997) is a Polish volleyball player, a member of Polish club GKS Katowice. ==Personal life== His father Andrzej is former Olympic volleyball player, six time Polish Champion. Also his uncle Krzysztof is former Olympic volleyball player, long-time member of Polish national team. He is studying economic analytics at University of Economics in Katowice. ==Career== His debuted in PlusLiga in 2015 as AZS Częstochowa player.Kacper Stelmach: sam pracuję na siebie - onet.pl - 14-04-2017 He didn't have many chance to play in main squad so he decided to move to GKS Katowice.KOLEJNY SIATKARZ DOŁĄCZYŁ DO GKS-U KATOWICE - katowickisport.pl - 14-04-2017 ==References== ==External links== * PlusLiga player profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Polish men's volleyball players Category:AZS Częstochowa players Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Kacper Stelmach
